basics.name: Camilo Lozano
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Hi! I'm from Miami, FL and come from a Colombian background. I have been a developer for 6+ years. With a focus on space and ground control systems.

work.name: Blue Origin
work.description: New Glenn Integrated Ground Systems (NG IGS)
work.summary: Work on the team developing the software used for launch operations of the New Glenn rocket. In charge of DevOps for team as well as working on the backend of our product.
highlights: Parallelized and optimized build and test pipelines for software
Developed packaging system for project. Deployed RPMs, NSIS, WHL
Contributed new features to the core C++ platform
Helped develop panels/displays in Qt
Created tooling and infrastructure for integrating Squish testing framework in our workflow
Created C++ API for interfacing with internal service

work.name: NASA (TOSC)
work.summary: Working on DevOps team to implement a multi flow pipeline for the current Launch Control System (LCS) for SLS.
highlights: Founding member and sub lead of Multi Flow Team
Architect restructure of LCS software to allow for quicker deployments
Administer and manage Gitlab and Artifactory
Developed parser for existing data ingest into a dynamic built data product
Containerization of existing software
Develop testing framework/pipeline for validation

work.name: NASA Swampworks
work.summary: Internship in conjunction with UCF, Florida Space Institute (FSI) and NASA Swampworks. In this project we were tasked with creating an open source implmentation of an existing Swampworks robot the RASSOR for use in situ mining. Our version would be mostly 3D printed and feature a full simulation.
highlights: Used ROS for Pub/Sub real time system (RTS) commnucation between components.
Developed application in React Native for controlling of robot
Created Blender models for use in Gazebo simulation

work.name: Ektec
work.summary: Ektec is a start up based in Miami that provides an open payment system for transportation systems, mainly servicing in Latin America. Allowing for use of regular bank cards at bus/transit/metro stops instead of a metro card.
highlights: Created an application for processing asynchronous credit card transactions on an embedded system
Integrated POS terminal, GPS, GPRS modem, relay switches to interface all together, for use in transit systems.
Sole developer for embedded device, in charge of deployment, maintenance and life cycle of devices

volunteer.summary: Program to teach high school students programming
highlights: Taught beginners to advanced, in Java, C and Python.
Lead a class that provided extra help to students taking the AP Computer Science exam.
